channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PowerLattice attracts investment from ex-Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger for its power saving chiplet
item.description: PowerLattice, a startup founded by veteran electrical engineers from Qualcomm, NUVIA, and Intel in 2023, claims to have developed a groundbreaking app...

item.title: Meta releases a new tool to protect reels creators from having their work stolen
item.description: On Monday, Meta introduced Facebook content protection, a mobile tool designed to detect when a creator's original reels posted to Facebook are being ...

item.title: Luminar is fighting with its biggest customer as bankruptcy threat looms
item.description: The fight comes at a perilous time for Luminar, which is running out of cash and under SEC investigation.

item.title: Ford turns to Amazon to give used cars sales a boost
item.description: Amazon Autos, which kicked off last year with Hyundai, initially started with new cars. The deal with Ford pushes it into used car territory.

item.title: DoorDash confirms data breach impacting users’ phone numbers and physical addresses
item.description: The delivery giant said “no sensitive information” was accessed, and did not specify the number of customers, delivery workers, and merchants who were...

item.title: A Collision with Space Debris Leaves 3 Chinese Astronauts Stranded in Orbit
item.description: The only craft docked at Tiangong space station has been damaged and “does not meet the release conditions for a safe manned return.”

item.title: Cisco acquires translation startup EzDubs
item.description: Cisco has acquired Y Combinator-backed translation app EzDub to integrate it into its communication suite.

item.title: Ramp hits $32B valuation, just 3 months after hitting $22.5B
item.description: In 2025 alone, Ramp has leapt from being worth $13 billion to $32 billion with new rounds every few months.

item.title: Jeff Bezos reportedly returns to the trenches as co-CEO of new AI startup, Project Prometheus
item.description: Amazon's founder Jeff Bezos seems to be getting his hands dirty once again: the billionaire is partly backing a new AI startup called Project Promethe...

item.title: 25 Best Tech Books to Gift (2025): Biographies, Startup Histories, Exposés
item.description: Give the techie in your life access to the inner workings of the companies and characters shaping Big Tech.
